Reference

Data handling

Agglomeration

agglomerateByRank(<SummarizedExperiment>) agglomerateByRank(<SingleCellExperiment>) agglomerateByRank(<TreeSummarizedExperiment>)

Agglomerate data using taxonomic information

mergeRows() mergeCols()

Merge a subset of the rows or columns of a SummarizedExperiment

splitByRanks() unsplitByRanks()

Split/Unsplit a SingleCellExperiment be taxonomic ranks

Transformation

transformCounts() ZTransform() relAbundanceCounts()

Transform Counts

Data loading

makeTreeSummarizedExperimentFromphyloseq()

Coerce a phyloseq object to a TreeSummarizedExperiment

makeTreeSummarizedExperimentFromDADA2()

Coerce ‘DADA2’ results to TreeSummarizedExperiment

loadFromBiom() makeTreeSummarizedExperimentFromBiom()

Loading a biom file

loadFromQIIME2()

Import QIIME2 results to TreeSummarizedExperiment

makePhyloseqFromTreeSummarizedExperiment()

Create a phyloseq object from a TreeSummarizedExperiment object

Taxonomic data

TAXONOMY_RANKS taxonomyRanks() taxonomyRankEmpty() checkTaxonomy() getTaxonomyLabels() taxonomyTree() addTaxonomyTree() IdTaxaToDataFrame()

Functions for accessing taxonomic data stored in rowData.

estimateDiversity() estimateFaith()

Estimate diversity measures

Beta Diversity

calculateUniFrac(<ANY>,<phylo>) calculateUniFrac(<TreeSummarizedExperiment>,<missing>) runUniFrac()

Calculate weighted or unweighted (Fast) UniFrac distance

calculateJSD(<ANY>) calculateJSD(<SummarizedExperiment>) runJSD()

Calculate the Jensen-Shannon Divergence

calculateDistance()

Calculate sample distances with vegan

calculateNMDS() runNMDS() plotNMDS()

Perform non-metric MDS on sample-level data

calculateCCA() runCCA() calculateRDA() runRDA()

Canonical Correspondance Analysis

Other diversity measurements

calculateDPCoA() runDPCoA()

Calculation of Double Principal Correspondance analysis
